languages.text: "Святыня, оберегаемая данным монастырем, дарует благословенную Движущую силу всей планете Райкад Минорис, и мы, недостойные, счастливы служить древней машине, обитающей здесь".

"The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."
languages.original_text: "Святыня, оберегаемая данным монастырем, дарует благословенную Движущую силу всей планете Райкад Минорис, и мы, недостойные, счастливы служить древней машине, обитающей здесь".

"The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are happy to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

languages.text: "Das Relikt, das dieses Kloster beschützt, versorgt den gesamten Planeten Rykad Minoris mit der gesegneten Antriebskraft. Und wir, unwürdig, wie wir auch sind, dienen nur zu gern der uralten Maschine, die hier haust."
languages.original_text: "The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Das Relikt, das dieses Kloster beschützt, versorgt den gesamten Planeten Rykad Minoris mit der gesegneten Antriebskraft. Und wir, unwürdig, wie wir auch sind, dienen nur zu gern der uralten Maschine, die hier haust."

languages.text: « La relique protégée dans ce monastère offre à toute la planète de Rykad Minoris une Force Motrice bénie et, nous autres, tout indignes que nous sommes, nous réjouissons de servir l'antique machine qui se trouve ici. »
languages.original_text: "The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

traits.locale_text: « La relique protégée dans ce monastère offre à toute la planète de Rykad Minoris une Force Motrice bénie et, nous autres, tout indignes que nous sommes, nous réjouissons de servir l'antique machine qui se trouve ici. »

languages.text: “这座修道院所保护的圣物，为整个小莱卡德提供了神圣的源力。我们不配居住在圣物旁边，但能为古老机器服务，还是让我们无比欣喜。”
languages.original_text: "The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

traits.locale_text: “这座修道院所保护的圣物，为整个小莱卡德提供了神圣的原初动力。我们不配居住在圣物旁边，但能为古老机器服务，还是让我们无比欣喜。”

languages.text: 「この修道院が守っている遺物は、ライカド・ミノリスの惑星全体へと祝福されし原動力をもたらしてくれる。そして我らは、それに値せずとも、この場に在る古代の機械へ仕えることができて幸いだ」
languages.original_text: "The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

traits.locale_text: 「この修道院が守っている遺物は、ライカド・ミノリスの惑星全体へと祝福されし原動力をもたらしてくれる。そして我らは、それに値せずとも、この場に在る古代の機械へ仕えることができて幸いだ」

languages.text: «La reliquia que protege este monasterio proporciona a todo el planeta de Rykad Minoris la Fuerza Motriz, y nosotros, por indignos que seamos, estamos encantados de servir a la antigua máquina que mora en este lugar».
languages.original_text: "The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

traits.locale_text: «La reliquia que protege este monasterio proporciona a todo el planeta de Rykad Minoris la Fuerza Motriz, y nosotros, por indignos que seamos, estamos encantados de servir a la antigua máquina que mora en este lugar».

languages.text: "Manastırın muhafaza ettiği yadigâr, tüm Rykad Minoris gezegenine kutsal Devinim Gücü sağlar. Bizler de her ne kadar layık olmasak da burada ikamet eden kadim makineye mutlak teslimiyetle hizmet ederiz."
languages.original_text: "The relic that this monastery protects provides the entire planet of Rykad Minoris with the blessed Motive Force, and we, unworthy though we are, are glad to serve the ancient machine that dwells in this place."

traits.locale_text: "Manastırın muhafaza ettiği yadigâr, tüm Rykad Minoris gezegenine kutsal Devinim Gücü sağlar. Bizler de her ne kadar layık olmasak da burada ikamet eden kadim makineye mutlak teslimiyetle hizmet ederiz."
